whyYouShouldWork: why you should work with us
welcomeWords: Welcome to the universe of Avantage Project, where we design special events just for you. Our projects guarantee unique experiences and ensure that every event, no matter how big or small, is executed with exceptional comfort and enjoyment in mind.
completedProjectsText: Under the leadership of Lilia Fedorova and Maria Rudakova, during our 10 years on the market, we have created unforgettable and meaningful events for a wide range of companies.
uniqueEventScenariosText: We are happy to share our experience and expertise, and to discuss each stage of our work in detail. We work with you to find the best solutions to your current business challenges. We love strong collaborations and will be your reliable partner for many years to come.
yearsInTheIndustryText: In 2014, we made the decision to move to an Agile system before many companies did. In 2018, we started working partially remotely, before it became mainstream. In 2020, we looked outside the box and learned how to make hybrid events so exceptional that we started winning awards for them.
PLANNINGANEVENTText: We will answer all your questions, break down the event brief and estimate the project
persData: I consent to the processing of my personal data
top50: We are among the TOP 50 communication agencies in Russia
goTg: You can follow our progress on Telegram. Subscribe: we share useful content and honestly show how an event agency works
bugMessage: Unfortunately, the page you requested has been moved or deleted, or perhaps it never existed in the first place
ENCYCLOPAEDIAText: Our Events Encyclopaedia is constantly being updated
WEAREANEVENTAGENCYText: The founders of the project are two strong professionals with many years of expertise in the field of event services, who have created a team that has become a top player in the market
text: You may not know us yet, but you definitely know our projects. Under the leadership of Lilia Fedorova and Maria Rudakova during 10 years on the market we have realised unforgettable large-scale events for different businesses. Most of our clients tend to come back to us with new exciting projects: Avito, QIWI, Alfa-Bank, VK, Car of the Year, Lukoil, Sberbank, Promsvyazbank, Re:store, START.ru, VEKA, Wargaming.net, Garena, ADV Consulting, Metadynea, ANALPA, etc. work with us.
videoGreeting: Video greeting from the founders of Avantage Project
sendarequesttoText: and we will promptly send you a list of the required documents
PLANNINGANEVENTPopup: We'll break down your event brief and estimate the project
TELLUSABOUTYOURPROJECTText: Just tell us about your project and we'll do the rest
